Test your RNN
=============

To analyse the probability of apparition of a SMILES while using the RNN, you can use the script *'tools/rnn_proba.py'*.

You can use two functions

.. autofunction:: tools.rnn_proba.proba_different_smiles
    :noindex:

.. autofunction:: tools.rnn_proba.proba_different_position
    :noindex:
